Package andesite.handler

Interface WebSocketState

public interface WebSocketState

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  WebSocketState.Key<T>
    Key used for connection storage.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String connectionId()
    The id of this connection.
    <T> T get​(WebSocketState.Key<T> key)
    Gets a value stored in this connection.
    boolean lavalink()
    Whether or not this connection is lavalink compatible.
    <T> T set​(WebSocketState.Key<T> key, T value)
    Stores a value in this connection.
    java.lang.String user()
    The user id of this socket.
    ServerWebSocket ws()
    The websocket connection.

  • Method Details

    • user

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue java.lang.String user()
      The user id of this socket. This is a default value and may be overriden per-payload.
      Returns:
      The user id.

    • ws

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue ServerWebSocket ws()
      The websocket connection. Can be used to send payloads to clients. All sent payloads sent must be valid json objects.
      Returns:
      The websocket connection.

    • connectionId

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue java.lang.String connectionId()
      The id of this connection. Used for resuming.
      Returns:
      The id of this connection.

    • lavalink

      @CheckReturnValue boolean lavalink()
      Whether or not this connection is lavalink compatible.
      Lavalink resumes are not supported.
      Returns:
      Whether or not this connection is lavalink compatible.

    • get

      @CheckReturnValue <T> T get​(@Nonnull WebSocketState.Key<T> key)
      Gets a value stored in this connection. Similar to ThreadLocal but on a connection scope.
      If no value is stored, the default is returned.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the object stored.
      Parameters:
      key - Key to lookup.
      Returns:
      The value stored. May be null.

    • set

      @Nullable <T> T set​(@Nonnull WebSocketState.Key<T> key, @Nullable T value)
      Stores a value in this connection. Similar to ThreadLocal but on a connection scope.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of object to store.
      Parameters:
      key - Key to store.
      value - Value to store.
      Returns:
      The old value. May be null.
